pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:5.1: 48. The training rule on monastery lodgings
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.2: At that time the nun Thullanandā went wandering without first relinquishing her lodging.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.3: Just then her lodging caught fire,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.8: She’ll just make us responsible for whatever is burnt.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.9: When Thullanandā came back to her lodging, she asked the nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.10: “Venerables, I hope you removed my things?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.13: “How could the nuns not remove the contents when a lodging is burning?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.1: But the nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.2: “How could Venerable Thullanandā go wandering without relinquishing her lodging?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.3: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.6: How can the nun Thullanandā go wandering without relinquishing her lodging?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.7: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.8: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:8.1: ‘If a nun goes wandering without relinquishing her lodging, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:10.2: one with a door is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:11.2: if she crosses the boundary of an enclosed lodging without first relinquishing it to a nun, a trainee nun, or a novice nun, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:11.3: If she goes beyond the vicinity of an unenclosed lodging, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:12.1: If it is not relinquished, and she does not perceive it as relinquished, and she goes, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:12.2: If it is not relinquished, but she is unsure of it, and she goes, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:12.3: If it is not relinquished, but she perceives it as relinquished, and she goes, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:13.1: If she does not relinquish a lodging without a door, and then goes, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:13.2: If it is relinquished, but she does not perceive it as relinquished, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:13.3: If it is relinquished, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:13.4: If it is relinquished, and she perceives it as relinquished, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:14.2: if she relinquishes it and then goes;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:14.4: if she searches, but is unable to find anyone to relinquish it to;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:14.8: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:15.1: The eighth training rule is finished.
